microservices.name: job-master
microservices.options:
options:
  kind: Deployment
  containers:
  - build:
      args: {}
      dockerfileTemplateArgs: {}
      repo: https://code.aliyun.com/sreworks_public/mirror.git
      dockerfileTemplate: master-Dockerfile
      ciAccount: public
      ciToken: public
      repoPath: saas/job/api/sreworks-job
      branch: master
    name: job-master
  env:
  - DB_HOST
  - DB_PORT
  - DB_USER
  - ES_PASSWORD
  - DB_NAME
  - REDIS_HOST
  - REDIS_PORT
  - REDIS_DATABASE
  - REDIS_PASSWORD
  - ES_USERNAME
  - JVM_XMX
  - JVM_XMS
  - ES_ENDPOINT
  - DB_PASSWORD
  initContainers:
  - build:
      args: {}
      dockerfileTemplateArgs: {}
      repo: https://code.aliyun.com/sreworks_public/mirror.git
      dockerfileTemplate: Dockerfile-db-migration
      ciAccount: public
      ciToken: public
      repoPath: saas/job/api/sreworks-job
      branch: master
    name: db-migration
  - build:
      args: {}
      dockerfileTemplateArgs: {}
      repo: https://code.aliyun.com/sreworks_public/mirror.git
      dockerfileTemplate: Dockerfile-init
      ciAccount: public
      ciToken: public
      repoPath: saas/job/api/sreworks-job
      branch: master
    name: init

microservices.name: job-worker
microservices.options:
options:
  kind: Deployment
  containers:
  - build:
      args: {}
      dockerfileTemplateArgs: {}
      repo: https://code.aliyun.com/sreworks_public/mirror.git
      dockerfileTemplate: worker-Dockerfile
      ciAccount: public
      ciToken: public
      repoPath: saas/job/api/sreworks-job
      branch: master
    name: job-worker
  env:
  - ES_PASSWORD
  - SREWORKS_JOB_MASTER_ENDPOINT
  - ES_ENDPOINT
  - JVM_XMX
  - JVM_XMS
  - ES_USERNAME
